verses.text: \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w*, \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w I|strong="G1125"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*; \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add both\add* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I stir \w up|strong="G1326"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w pure|strong="G1506"\w* \w minds|strong="G1271"\w* by way \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w remembrance|strong="G5280"\w*:

That ye may be \w mindful|strong="G3415"\w* of the \w words|strong="G4487"\w* which were spoken \w before|strong="G4280"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G4396"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*:

\w Knowing|strong="G1097"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* there shall \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2250"\w* \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w scoffers|strong="G1703"\w*, \w walking|strong="G4198"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w of|strong="G3952"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w since|strong="G0575"\w* the \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* fell \w asleep|strong="G2837"\w*, all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w continue|strong="G1265"\w* \w as|strong="G3779"\w* \add they were\add* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w* of the \w creation|strong="G2937"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w willingly|strong="G2309"\w* are ignorant \w of|strong="G2990"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* by the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* of \w old|strong="G1597"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w standing|strong="G4921"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1223"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*:
\w Whereby|strong="G1223"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* that then \w was|strong="G5119"\w*, being \w overflowed|strong="G2626"\w* with \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w perished|strong="G0622"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, which are \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \w by|strong="G3056"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* kept in \w store|strong="G2343"\w*, \w reserved|strong="G5083"\w* unto \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perdition|strong="G0684"\w* \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w ungodly|strong="G0765"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w*, \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w be|strong="G2990"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* ignorant \w of|strong="G2990"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* one \w thing|strong="G1520"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \add is\add* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w thousand|strong="G5507"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G1019"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w slack|strong="G1019"\w* concerning his \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* some \w men|strong="G5100"\w* \w count|strong="G2233"\w* \w slackness|strong="G1022"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* is \w longsuffering|strong="G3114"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w us-ward|strong="G2248"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* willing \w that|strong="G1014"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* should \w perish|strong="G0622"\w*, but \w that|strong="G0235"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* should \w come|strong="G5562"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* will \w come|strong="G2240"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w thief|strong="G2812"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w night|strong="G3571"\w*; \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* shall pass \w away|strong="G3928"\w* with a great \w noise|strong="G4500"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the \w elements|strong="G4747"\w* shall \w melt|strong="G3089"\w* with fervent \w heat|strong="G2741"\w*, the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w therein|strong="G1722"\w* shall be burned \w up|strong="G2618"\w*.

\add Seeing\add* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \add that\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w* shall be \w dissolved|strong="G3089"\w*, what \w manner|strong="G4217"\w* \add of persons\add* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* to \w be|strong="G5225"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add all\add* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*,

Looking \w for|strong="G4328"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hasting \w unto|strong="G4692"\w* the \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* of the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G1223"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* being on \w fire|strong="G4448"\w* shall be \w dissolved|strong="G3089"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w elements|strong="G4747"\w* shall \w melt|strong="G5080"\w* with fervent \w heat|strong="G2741"\w*?

\w Nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G4328"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w promise|strong="G1862"\w*, look \w for|strong="G4328"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G1722"\w* \w dwelleth|strong="G2730"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w*, \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, seeing that ye look \w for|strong="G4328"\w* such \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, be diligent \w that|strong="G4704"\w* ye may be \w found|strong="G2147"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, without \w spot|strong="G0784"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blameless|strong="G0298"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w account|strong="G2233"\w* \add that\add* the \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add is\add* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*; even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w written|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*;

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add his\add* \w epistles|strong="G1992"\w*, \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w*; \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* some \w things|strong="G5100"\w* hard to be \w understood|strong="G1425"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they that are \w unlearned|strong="G0261"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unstable|strong="G0793"\w* \w wrest|strong="G4761"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \add they do\add* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* the \w other|strong="G3062"\w* \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w*, \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w destruction|strong="G0684"\w*.

\w Ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, seeing ye \w know|strong="G4267"\w* \add these things\add* \w before|strong="G4267"\w*, \w beware|strong="G5442"\w* \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* ye \w also|strong="G1601"\w*, being led \w away|strong="G4879"\w* with the \w error|strong="G4106"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="G0113"\w*, \w fall|strong="G1601"\w* \w from|strong="G4740"\w* your \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w stedfastness|strong="G4740"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w grow|strong="G0837"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add in\add* the \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*. To \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.
